::KitKat3::
She transformed into bot mode and decided to deal with things in her 
old way.  She walked into the conference room and nodded to DarkFate. 
She motioned for him to talk to her when he was finished.  She stood 
just outside the doorway, hoping to see if she could make her plans 
work or not.  She hoped that if the predacons had gathered enough 
strength in her absence, then perhaps they could launch an all out 
assault on the maximals and crush them once and for all.  Then, she'd 
take out the Allience.  She still remembered how She was betrayed so 
long ago.  But just as these thoughts went through her mind, the 
loyalty program jolted her and she fell to her knees.  She got up and 
sighed. "Zardus is my master and it is him who I obey." she said 
whispering to herself.  Her optics flashed, but returned to norma.  
Now her only thought was on crushing the maximals. 


::KitKat2::
She made it to the weapons bay and the shuttle hanger. She couldn't 
believe how  no one stopped her during her explorations. 
She took a wrong turn and found herself in the holding cell area. She 
swallowed hard and walked carefully down the hallway.  She saw cells 
on either side of her as she walked.
